Html:
Hi,


Firstly, I would like to congratulate you on an excellent port.

I would like to know whether it is possible to input an existing TIN and then add holes (hide boundary) to a specified region on that TIN?

The existing triangles would need to be split by the boundary and then the points re-triangulated at/to the boundary.


Regards,

BP
No worries. Thanks for your reply.
